name: Central District
description: The Central District is the heart of the capital city, bustling with activity, commercial centers, and cultural landmarks. It is home to many government buildings, corporate headquarters, and iconic monuments.

name: Riverside District
description: The Riverside District is characterized by its scenic riverfront, parks, and recreational facilities. It is a popular spot for outdoor activities such as boating, picnicking, and cycling.

name: Greenwood District
description: The Greenwood District is known for its lush greenery, residential neighborhoods, and community amenities. It offers a serene environment away from the hustle and bustle of the city.

name: Tech Hub District
description: The Tech Hub District is a vibrant area known for its concentration of technology companies, startups, and innovation hubs. It is a magnet for entrepreneurs, tech enthusiasts, and investors.

name: Historic Quarter District
description: The Historic Quarter District is a treasure trove of historical sites, museums, and heritage buildings. It offers visitors a glimpse into the rich cultural heritage and architectural legacy of the region.

name: Waterfront District
description: The Waterfront District is a lively waterfront area lined with restaurants, cafes, and entertainment venues. It offers stunning views of the harbor and is a popular destination for dining and nightlife.

name: Industrial Zone District
description: The Industrial Zone District is a key industrial area characterized by factories, warehouses, and logistics centers. It plays a crucial role in the economy by supporting manufacturing and distribution activities.

name: University District
description: The University District is home to several universities, research institutions, and educational facilities. It is a hub of learning and innovation, attracting students, academics, and intellectuals from around the world.

name: Arts and Culture District
description: The Arts and Culture District is a vibrant hub of artistic expression, featuring theaters, galleries, and performance venues. It celebrates creativity and diversity through various cultural events and exhibitions.

name: Commercial Center District
description: The Commercial Center District is a bustling commercial hub with shopping malls, retail outlets, and business complexes. It is a shopping paradise and a major destination for shoppers and tourists.
